meta.note: Eligibility and steps can change. Always prefer official sources; sources links are attached per item.

entry_points.name_zh: 社会服务办公室（SSO）+ ComCare 热线
国家心理援助热线 mindline 1771

schemes.summary_en: Temporary financial support for individuals/families facing difficulties; assessed holistically by SSOs.
schemes.summary_zh: 为面临短期经济困难的个人/家庭提供支持；由 SSO 进行整体评估。
eligibility_en: Applicant must be a Singapore Citizen or Permanent Resident (PR); if PR, at least one immediate family member in the same household must be a Singapore Citizen.
Eligibility is decided by SSO via holistic assessment (e.g., household income, savings, and availability of family support).
SMTA is typically granted for 3–6 months initially; renewals depend on continued need.
eligibility_zh: 申请人须为新加坡公民或永久居民（PR）；若为 PR，同住家庭成员中至少一名直系亲属须为新加坡公民。
是否符合由 SSO 进行整体评估（例如家庭收入、储蓄、家庭支持情况等）。
一般首次批复为 3–6 个月，是否续批视后续需要而定。
how_to_apply_en: Online: apply anytime via SupportGoWhere (ComCare SMTA).
In-person: visit your nearest Social Service Office (SSO) and apply.
If you need help completing the online form, contact the ComCare hotline or email Ask_SSO@msf.gov.sg.
how_to_apply_zh: 线上：通过 SupportGoWhere 随时提交 ComCare SMTA 申请。
线下：前往就近的社会服务办公室（SSO）办理。
如需协助填写线上表格，可致电 ComCare 热线或邮件联系 Ask_SSO@msf.gov.sg。
docs_to_prepare_en: Basic identification details for household members.
Information needed for assessment (e.g., income/employment situation, household circumstances).
docs_to_prepare_zh: 家庭成员的基本身份信息。
用于评估所需信息（如收入/就业情况、家庭困难状况等）。

schemes.summary_en: Short-term support while longer-term assistance is being assessed (administered via SSOs).
schemes.summary_zh: 在评估更长期援助期间提供短期支持（通常由 SSO 协助）。
eligibility_en: Administered via SSOs; assessment depends on the household’s situation.
Generally used when immediate help is needed while longer-term support is being assessed.
eligibility_zh: 由 SSO 协助办理，是否符合视个案评估而定。
常用于“急需支援、同时正在评估更长期援助”的情形。
how_to_apply_en: Contact ComCare/SSO (hotline or visit SSO) for urgent financial assistance triage.
SSO will advise what interim support is appropriate and what follow-up steps are needed.
how_to_apply_zh: 如需紧急经济支援，可联系 ComCare/SSO（热线或就近 SSO）。
SSO 会根据情况安排适当的临时支援并告知后续步骤。

schemes.summary_en: Government support package to help Singaporeans manage cost-of-living, delivered through multiple components.
schemes.summary_zh: 政府生活费支持配套，包含多种组成部分。
eligibility_en: Eligibility differs by component; check the GovBenefits portal for the latest criteria and your status.
eligibility_zh: 不同组成部分条件不同；请以 GovBenefits 门户最新规则与个人查询结果为准。
how_to_apply_en: Most components are auto-assessed; use GovBenefits to check eligibility and payout information.
how_to_apply_zh: 多数项目为自动评估发放；可在 GovBenefits 查询资格与发放信息。

schemes.summary_en: Support package for lower- and middle-income Singaporeans to manage cost-of-living (different components).
schemes.summary_zh: 帮助中低收入人群应对生活成本的支持计划（含不同组成部分）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility differs by component; check GovBenefits for the latest criteria.
eligibility_zh: 不同组成部分条件不同；以 GovBenefits 最新说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: Many components are credited automatically if eligible; verify via GovBenefits.
how_to_apply_zh: 部分项目自动入账/发放；建议在 GovBenefits 核对。

schemes.summary_en: Cash payouts for eligible Singaporeans to help with cost-of-living.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件者提供现金补助以缓解生活成本压力。
eligibility_en: Check your eligibility on GovBenefits (criteria vary over time).
eligibility_zh: 通过 GovBenefits 查询资格（条件会随政策调整）。
how_to_apply_en: Typically auto-assessed; check payout details on GovBenefits.
how_to_apply_zh: 通常自动评估发放；在 GovBenefits 查看发放信息。

schemes.summary_en: Utilities rebates to help households offset utilities bills.
schemes.summary_zh: 水电费回扣，帮助家庭减轻公用事业账单负担。
eligibility_en: Depends on household/housing type; verify via GovBenefits.
eligibility_zh: 与住房/家庭条件有关；以 GovBenefits 为准。
how_to_apply_en: Generally credited automatically if eligible.
how_to_apply_zh: 一般自动入账/抵扣。

schemes.summary_en: Service & Conservancy Charges (S&CC) rebates for eligible HDB households.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的组屋家庭提供 S&CC（杂费）回扣。
eligibility_en: Eligibility rules vary; check GovBenefits for details.
eligibility_zh: 条件可能变动；以 GovBenefits 为准。
how_to_apply_en: Typically automatic for eligible households.
how_to_apply_zh: 通常自动发放/抵扣。

schemes.summary_en: Vouchers for Singaporean households to help with daily expenses at participating merchants/hawkers/supermarkets.
schemes.summary_zh: 为新加坡家庭提供用于日常消费的购物券，可在指定商户/小贩中心/超市使用。
eligibility_en: Generally targeted at Singaporean households; each tranche may have specific rules—check the official site.
eligibility_zh: 一般面向新加坡家庭；不同批次规则以官网为准。
how_to_apply_en: Go to the official CDC Vouchers site.
Log in (Singpass) and follow on-screen steps to claim.
You can usually share voucher links/QR with household members according to site guidance.
Use at participating hawkers/merchants/supermarkets as indicated on the site.
how_to_apply_zh: 进入 CDC Vouchers 官网。
使用 Singpass 登录并按页面步骤领取。
可按官网指引将券分享给家庭成员（如适用）。
在参与计划的商户/小贩/超市使用（以官网列表为准）。

schemes.summary_en: Income supplement for eligible lower-wage workers to boost take-home pay and retirement savings.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的低薪员工提供收入补助，提升现有收入并支持退休储蓄。
eligibility_en: Singapore Citizen (WIS rules differ by employment type—employee/self-employed/platform worker).
Must meet age and income criteria set by CPF/MOM (varies by work year).
Generally auto-assessed based on CPF contributions and/or declarations, depending on worker type.
eligibility_zh: 通常要求为新加坡公民（不同就业类型：雇员/自雇/平台工作者规则会不同）。
需满足 CPF/MOM 规定的年龄与收入条件（会随年度调整）。
一般会按 CPF 缴交/申报记录自动评估（视就业类型）。
how_to_apply_en: Most eligible employees are auto-assessed based on CPF contributions (no separate application).
Use CPF/GovBenefits e-services to check eligibility and payment info.
how_to_apply_zh: 符合条件的雇员多为自动评估（通常无需另行申请）。
可在 CPF / GovBenefits 电子服务查询资格与发放信息。

schemes.name_zh: Silver Support 长者补助计划
schemes.summary_en: Quarterly cash payouts for eligible low-income elderly; auto-assessed.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的低收入长者提供按季度发放现金补助；自动评估。
eligibility_en: Singapore Citizen aged 65 and above.
Eligibility is auto-assessed based on factors like lifetime wages (CPF contributions), housing type, and household income per person.
Seniors on ComCare Long-Term Assistance receive Silver Support at a fixed quarterly amount (per CPF guidance).
eligibility_zh: 65 岁及以上新加坡公民。
一般自动评估，常见考量包括：工作期间收入/CPF 贡献、住房类型、家庭人均收入等。
若为 ComCare Long-Term Assistance 受助者，Silver Support 发放规则以 CPF 说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: No application needed (auto-assessed).
You can check eligibility via CPF/GovBenefits e-services.
how_to_apply_zh: 无需申请（自动评估）。
可通过 CPF / GovBenefits 电子服务查询资格。

schemes.summary_en: Longer-term support for lower-income families with children to work towards stability and self-reliance.
schemes.summary_zh: 为有孩子的低收入家庭提供更长期支持，协助迈向稳定与自立。
eligibility_en: Typically targeted at lower-income families with children; exact criteria and support plans vary by case.
eligibility_zh: 一般面向有孩子的低收入家庭；具体条件与支持方案视个案而定。
how_to_apply_en: Start via SSO / MSF channels; you may be assessed and guided to the appropriate support plan.
how_to_apply_zh: 可通过 SSO / MSF 渠道起步，后续将评估并引导进入相应支持计划。

schemes.summary_en: Credits for eligible Singapore Citizens to offset out-of-pocket course fees for approved courses.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的新加坡公民提供课程学分，用于抵扣认可课程自付费用。
eligibility_en: Singapore Citizens aged 25+ (subject to current policy).
eligibility_zh: 通常为 25+ 新加坡公民（以现行政策为准）。
how_to_apply_en: Log in to MySkillsFuture and select an approved course.
Use SkillsFuture Credit at checkout / claim flow as guided by the portal.
how_to_apply_zh: 登录 MySkillsFuture 选择认可课程。
按门户流程在支付/申领时使用 SkillsFuture Credit。

schemes.summary_en: Subsidised public rental housing for eligible lower-income households.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的低收入家庭提供补贴性质公共租赁住房。
eligibility_en: Eligibility depends on HDB rules (e.g., household profile and income). Check the official scheme page for the latest criteria.
eligibility_zh: 需符合 HDB 规定（如家庭情况、收入等）；以官网最新条件为准。
how_to_apply_en: Apply via the official HDB route (e.g., HDB e-services / designated application channel).
Prepare required household and income information as requested in the form.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 HDB 官方渠道申请（如 HDB 电子服务/指定入口）。
按表格要求准备家庭与收入信息。

schemes.name_zh: Interim Rental Housing（IRH 临时租住房）
schemes.summary_en: Temporary rental option for households awaiting their next housing arrangement (subject to criteria).
schemes.summary_zh: 为过渡期间的家庭提供临时租住房选择（需符合条件）。
eligibility_en: Subject to HDB assessment and criteria; refer to official HDB guidance.
eligibility_zh: 需符合 HDB 评估与条件；以 HDB 官方说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: Check official HDB guidance for the latest application route and required documents.
how_to_apply_zh: 查看 HDB 官网最新申请入口与材料要求。

schemes.summary_en: Temporary housing support for eligible families awaiting their new home.
schemes.summary_zh: 为等待新房的符合条件家庭提供临时住房支持。
eligibility_en: Eligibility and quotas apply; confirm on HDB’s official PPHS information.
eligibility_zh: 需符合资格与配额安排；以 HDB PPHS 官方说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: Apply via HDB according to the published PPHS steps and required documents.
how_to_apply_zh: 按 HDB 公布步骤与材料要求申请。

schemes.summary_en: Temporary accommodation for homeless families who have exhausted other options.
schemes.summary_zh: 为已无其他住宿选择的无家可归家庭提供临时安置。
eligibility_en: Requires assessment/referral by service providers; availability and criteria vary.
eligibility_zh: 通常需要服务机构评估/转介；名额与条件视情况而定。
how_to_apply_en: Start from SupportGoWhere listings for the latest contact/referral route.
If urgent, contact SSO for triage and referral guidance.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 SupportGoWhere 查询最新联系/转介方式。
如为紧急情况，可联系 SSO 进行初步评估与转介。

schemes.name_zh: Transit Point @ Margaret Drive（临时过渡点）
schemes.summary_en: Temporary stay option for individuals/families in housing crisis (subject to referral/assessment).
schemes.summary_zh: 为住房危机个案提供临时住宿选择（通常需转介/评估）。
eligibility_en: Referral/assessment required; check SupportGoWhere listing for latest access rules.
eligibility_zh: 通常需转介/评估；以 SupportGoWhere 列表最新说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: Use SupportGoWhere for the current contact and referral steps.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 SupportGoWhere 查看最新联系与转介步骤。

schemes.summary_en: Subsidies for medical/dental care at participating clinics for Singapore Citizens (tiered).
schemes.summary_zh: 为新加坡公民在参与计划的诊所/牙科诊所提供分级补贴。
eligibility_en: For Singapore Citizens; subsidy tier depends on eligibility criteria defined by MOH/CHAS.
eligibility_zh: 面向新加坡公民；补贴等级取决于 MOH/CHAS 规定条件。
how_to_apply_en: Apply via the CHAS portal as instructed (online application).
After approval, use CHAS at participating GP/dental clinics.
how_to_apply_zh: 按 CHAS 官网指引在线申请。
获批后在参与计划的诊所/牙科使用补贴。

schemes.summary_en: Financial assistance for patients who have difficulty paying medical bills; usually via Medical Social Worker.
schemes.summary_zh: 为难以支付医疗账单的患者提供援助；通常通过医疗社工办理。
eligibility_en: Assessed by the healthcare institution; typically for patients who still have difficulty paying after other means.
eligibility_zh: 由医疗机构评估；一般用于在其他方式后仍难以负担费用的患者。
how_to_apply_en: Ask the Medical Social Worker at your hospital/clinic for assessment and application guidance.
how_to_apply_zh: 联系就诊机构的医疗社工进行评估并按指引申请。

schemes.summary_en: National medical savings scheme to help pay for approved healthcare expenses.
schemes.summary_zh: 国家保健储蓄计划，可用于支付符合规定的医疗支出。
eligibility_en: Use is subject to approved items and withdrawal limits depending on treatment/service.
eligibility_zh: 可使用范围与提取额度取决于医疗项目/服务类型（以官方规则为准）。
how_to_apply_en: Typically used at point of care; the institution will guide you based on applicable rules.
how_to_apply_zh: 一般在就医结算时按规定使用，由医疗机构按规则协助处理。

schemes.summary_en: Basic national health insurance that helps pay for large hospital bills and select costly outpatient treatments.
schemes.summary_zh: 国家基础医疗保险，帮助支付较大住院费用及部分高额门诊治疗费用。
eligibility_en: Coverage rules and subsidies follow MOH guidance; premium subsidies may apply.
eligibility_zh: 保障与补贴规则以 MOH 官方说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: Generally automatic coverage for Singaporeans/PRs; claims are made through the healthcare institution according to rules.
how_to_apply_zh: 通常为自动覆盖；理赔一般由医疗机构按规则处理。

schemes.name_zh: Pioneer Generation Package（建国一代配套）
schemes.summary_en: Healthcare support for eligible Pioneer Generation seniors, including premium subsidies and other benefits.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的建国一代长者提供医疗支持（含保费补贴等）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility is based on official Pioneer Generation criteria; benefits are typically administered automatically.
eligibility_zh: 资格以官方“建国一代”条件为准；福利一般为自动评估发放/适用。
how_to_apply_en: Generally no application needed; verify on official pages if unsure.
how_to_apply_zh: 通常无需申请；如不确定可在官方页面核对。

schemes.name_zh: Merdeka Generation Package（立国一代配套）
schemes.summary_en: Healthcare benefits for eligible seniors, including additional outpatient subsidies and premium subsidies.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的长者提供医疗支持（含门诊补贴、保费补贴等）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility follows official Merdeka Generation criteria; benefits are typically administered automatically.
eligibility_zh: 资格以官方“立国一代”条件为准；福利一般自动适用/发放。
how_to_apply_en: Generally no application needed; verify on official pages if unsure.
how_to_apply_zh: 通常无需申请；如不确定可在官方页面核对。

schemes.summary_en: Long-term care insurance scheme that provides monthly payouts if an insured develops severe disability.
schemes.summary_zh: 长期护理保险；若发生严重失能，可获得月度现金给付。
eligibility_en: Payout claims require meeting the programme’s severe disability definition and assessment process, per official guidance.
eligibility_zh: 申请给付需符合官方“严重失能”定义与评估流程。
how_to_apply_en: Follow official claim guidance and submit required documents/assessment as instructed.
how_to_apply_zh: 按官方理赔指引提交评估与材料。

schemes.summary_en: National preventive health initiative; enrol with a family doctor and receive structured support for healthier living.
schemes.summary_zh: 国家预防与健康促进计划；与家庭医生建立长期健康管理支持。
eligibility_en: MOH progressively invites Singapore Citizens and PRs aged 40 and above; enrolment rules can change over time—check official FAQ.
eligibility_zh: MOH 会逐步邀请 40 岁及以上的新加坡公民与永久居民；具体报名规则以官方 FAQ 为准。
how_to_apply_en: Follow the official enrolment guidance; choose an enrolled clinic/polyclinic as instructed.
how_to_apply_zh: 按官方报名指引选择并登记参与诊所/综合诊疗所。

schemes.name_zh: AIC 照护服务（长者与照护者支持）
schemes.summary_en: One-stop portal for community care services and caregiver resources.
schemes.summary_zh: 提供社区照护服务与照护者资源的一站式平台。
eligibility_en: Depends on service type and assessment.
eligibility_zh: 取决于服务类型与评估。
how_to_apply_en: Browse the relevant care service on AIC.sg.
Common route: talk to your doctor (hospital/polyclinic) for referral/application, or visit an AIC Link for assistance (service-dependent).
how_to_apply_zh: 在 AIC.sg 查询对应照护服务。
常见路径：由医院/综合诊疗所医生协助转介/申请，或到 AIC Link 获取协助（视服务而定）。

schemes.summary_en: Subsidies for assistive technology devices for eligible persons with disabilities (assessment required).
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的残障人士提供辅助科技器材补贴（需评估）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility and assessment apply; see SG Enable guidance.
eligibility_zh: 需符合条件并完成评估；以 SG Enable 指引为准。
how_to_apply_en: Apply via SG Enable / approved assessors as required by the programme.
how_to_apply_zh: 按 SG Enable 指引通过评估机构/渠道申请。

schemes.name_zh: Open Door Programme（ODP 就业支持）
schemes.summary_en: Grants and employment support to help employers hire and integrate persons with disabilities.
schemes.summary_zh: 通过补助与就业支持，帮助雇主聘用并融入残障人士。
eligibility_en: Programme is employer-facing; details and grant components are on SG Enable.
eligibility_zh: 通常面向雇主；具体补助与条件以 SG Enable 说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: Employers contact SG Enable and follow ODP application steps.
how_to_apply_zh: 雇主联系 SG Enable 并按 ODP 流程申请。

schemes.name_zh: Enabling Employment Credit（EEC 工资抵扣）
schemes.summary_en: Wage offsets for employers hiring persons with disabilities (auto-assessed via CPF contributions).
schemes.summary_zh: 雇主聘用残障人士可获得工资抵扣（通常根据 CPF 自动评估发放）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility and payout rules are defined by IRAS; generally computed from CPF contributions.
eligibility_zh: 资格与发放规则以 IRAS 为准；通常基于 CPF 缴交记录计算。
how_to_apply_en: Generally no application needed if eligible; follow IRAS guidance.
how_to_apply_zh: 多数情况下无需申请；以 IRAS 指引为准。

schemes.summary_en: Financial assistance for eligible students (school-based; details vary).
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件学生提供助学支持（通常以学校流程为主）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility and benefits vary by school level; apply via the school according to MOE guidance.
eligibility_zh: 资格与补助内容随学段/学校规定而异；通常按 MOE 指引由学校受理。
how_to_apply_en: Contact your child’s school; follow the school’s MOE FAS application process.
how_to_apply_zh: 联系学校并按学校的 MOE FAS 流程办理。

schemes.summary_en: Fee assistance for eligible children in participating kindergartens.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件儿童提供幼儿园学费援助（限参与机构）。
eligibility_en: Criteria apply; refer to MSF/official guidance and participating kindergarten rules.
eligibility_zh: 需符合条件；以 MSF/官方说明与参与幼儿园规则为准。
how_to_apply_en: Apply through the participating kindergarten as guided.
how_to_apply_zh: 按参与幼儿园指引申请。

schemes.name_zh: 托儿补贴（基础补贴与额外补贴）
schemes.summary_en: Subsidies to reduce childcare fees at licensed centres (subject to criteria).
schemes.summary_zh: 为在持牌中心就读的儿童提供托儿费用补贴（需符合条件）。
eligibility_en: Depends on citizenship and household factors; see ECDA guidance.
eligibility_zh: 与国籍/家庭条件相关；以 ECDA 指引为准。
how_to_apply_en: Typically arranged through the childcare centre; follow ECDA/centre instructions.
how_to_apply_zh: 通常通过托育中心办理；按 ECDA/中心指引执行。

schemes.summary_en: Fee assistance for eligible primary school students attending student care centres.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的小学生托管（Student Care）提供费用援助。
eligibility_en: Criteria apply; check MSF guidance.
eligibility_zh: 以 MSF 条件为准。
how_to_apply_en: Apply via the student care centre; follow MSF process.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过学生托管中心申请，按 MSF 流程办理。

schemes.name_zh: Baby Bonus（含 CDA 儿童发展账户）
schemes.summary_en: Support for families with children, including cash gift and Child Development Account benefits (per current policy).
schemes.summary_zh: 为育儿家庭提供支持（如现金礼与 CDA 儿童发展账户等，按现行政策）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility and benefits vary; check official policy pages.
eligibility_zh: 条件与金额以官网为准。
how_to_apply_en: Apply/activate via official channels as guided (e.g., LifeSG / government portal instructions).
how_to_apply_zh: 按官方渠道指引（如 LifeSG/政府入口）申请/开通。

schemes.summary_en: Early childhood support programme for eligible families to give children a good start.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件家庭提供儿童早期发展支持，帮助孩子更好起步。
eligibility_en: Eligibility criteria apply; see official info.
eligibility_zh: 以官方条件为准。
how_to_apply_en: Check official channels / referral routes on SupportGoWhere or MSF.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 SupportGoWhere/MSF 查看官方入口或转介流程。

schemes.summary_en: 24/7 mental health helpline/textline and webchat for support and guidance.
schemes.summary_zh: 提供 24/7 心理支持热线/文字服务与网页聊天，协助获得帮助与转介。
eligibility_en: Open access; use hotline/text/webchat options per mindline.sg.
eligibility_zh: 一般可直接使用；按 mindline.sg 指引选择热线/网页聊天等方式。
how_to_apply_en: Call 1771 or use mindline.sg webchat; follow on-screen steps.
how_to_apply_zh: 拨打 1771 或使用 mindline.sg 网页聊天并按页面步骤操作。

schemes.summary_en: Community-based support for individuals/families (information, referral, casework).
schemes.summary_zh: 社区家庭支持（信息与转介、个案工作等）。
eligibility_en: Services are generally open-access; actual support depends on needs and centre capacity.
eligibility_zh: 一般可直接求助；具体服务视需求与中心安排而定。
how_to_apply_en: Find your nearest FSC via SupportGoWhere and contact the centre.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 SupportGoWhere 查询就近 FSC 并联系中心。

schemes.name_zh: Strengthening Families Programme（FAM 家庭强化计划）
schemes.summary_en: Family counselling and support services for families facing challenges (centre-based).
schemes.summary_zh: 为面临多重挑战的家庭提供辅导与支持服务（中心服务）。
eligibility_en: Service access depends on centre arrangements; check the SupportGoWhere listing.
eligibility_zh: 以服务中心安排为准；参考 SupportGoWhere 列表说明。
how_to_apply_en: Check the SupportGoWhere listing and contact the centre for appointment/intake.
how_to_apply_zh: 在 SupportGoWhere 查看服务点并联系中心预约/登记。

schemes.summary_en: Legal aid for eligible applicants; application via the LAB portal and processes.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件者提供法律援助；可通过 LAB 入口申请并按流程办理。
eligibility_en: Eligibility is subject to LAB’s criteria (commonly includes means/merits considerations depending on case type). Check official LAB guidance.
eligibility_zh: 需符合 LAB 的资格要求（常见会涉及经济状况/案件条件等，视案件类型而定）；以官网说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: Apply via the LAB portal and follow the stated steps for forms and supporting documents.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 LAB 门户按步骤在线申请并提交表格与材料。

schemes.name_zh: Uplifting Employment Credit（UEC 雇主工资抵扣）
schemes.summary_en: Wage offset for employers hiring eligible ex-offenders (time-limited support; rules apply).
schemes.summary_zh: 为雇主聘用符合条件的更生人士提供工资抵扣（期限与规则以官方为准）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility and payout rules are defined by IRAS; see official scheme page.
eligibility_zh: 资格与发放规则以 IRAS 为准；参见官方页面。
how_to_apply_en: Refer to IRAS guidance; typically computed from CPF contributions if eligible.
how_to_apply_zh: 按 IRAS 指引执行；通常基于 CPF 缴交记录计算发放。

schemes.summary_en: Support for employers to adjust to mandatory wage increases and uplift lower-wage workers (rules apply).
schemes.summary_zh: 支持雇主应对低薪员工工资提升要求并促进加薪（以官方规则为准）。
eligibility_en: Check IRAS for eligibility and payout details.
eligibility_zh: 以 IRAS 说明为准。
how_to_apply_en: Refer to IRAS guidance; digital services may apply.
how_to_apply_zh: 按 IRAS 指引；可使用相关电子服务。
